👋 Welcome to my portfolio

Software Quality Assurance
Enthusiast

Hi! I'm Angelita Dumaria Panjaitan, a Software QA Engineer Enthusiast with a strong foundation in both manual and automated testing. A graduate of Institut Teknologi Del with experience in ensuring software quality through comprehensive testing methodologies. I specialize in manual testing, API testing, and performance testing, with a keen eye for detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality software products.
